event.title: Escape strategies from The Unavoidable Murphy's Law - RomaJS #AperiTech
event.description:
IMPORTANTE: per accedere facilmente agli spazi offerti da EnLabs Ã¨ necessario registrare la propria presenza su: https://www.eventbrite.it/e/biglietti-escape-strategies-from-the-unavoidable-murphys-law-romajs-aperitech-34355469133

Escape strategies from The Unavoidable Murphy's Law

Even most skilled developers sometimes fail.
Test automation may be considered a waste of time but it is a toll you need to pay to be a good professional.
I will show you the way so you can walk on your own.

Speaker: Paolo Mariotti (@paolommj)

Tips of the month: Testing React components with Enzyme

Enzyme is a JavaScript Testing utility for React that makes it easier to assert, manipulate, and traverse your React Components' output. We'll see how getting started and setup your react test environment.

Speaker: Matteo Manchi (@matteomanchi)

A seguire, classica social dinner!
